entry.title: Sampha - Blood On Me - 가사
entry.content:
grey hoodies, they cover their heads
i can’t see their faces, can’t see see see
they knew me, look sweat on my head
my heart was thumping, drumming

no need, no need to take from me
don’t throw the paint on me
i see this lake forming
i got lost astray,
in this forest running away

i slip up, i’m on the edge now,
they see me and i nearly,
i nearly lose my grip
but you held on to me,
and you shake and tell me that i'm ok but

i swear they smell the blood on me
i hear them coming for me

i wake up, and the sky's blood red
still heavy breathing
felt so much more than dreaming
i get up, they’re at the edge of my bed
how did they finally find me.
they said, there’s something bleeding in me
something screaming in me
something buried deep beneath

well i need to, need to get away
so get in, steal this get away
and i accelerate and i accelerate
but my gears got stuck
i’m on this road now
i’m so alone now,
swerving out of control now.
and i crash the whip,
and this tree flew through me
arms out you pull me
and wipe my wounds clean but

i swear they smell the blood on me
i hear them coming for me
